title: Chapter 1043 - Stabbed In The Back
volume_title: Sword In Hand, He Stands Above The Wilds, Sovereign Throughout The Ages
body:
Chapter 1043 - Stabbed In The Back

Profound Serenity Emperors were, of course, quite strong.

Even in the Nine Provinces of the Wilds, they were the pillars of top factions!

But…

In Su Yi’s eyes, with the exception of a few particularly dazzling, peerless talents, the world’s Profound Serenity Emperors had long since ceased to be worthy of his attention.

Besides, he hadn’t come to the Autumn Waters Assembly to make friends. How could he possibly concern himself with his enemies’ origins?

“Uh…” Yue Yunshan was at a loss for words. To his surprise, he could tell that Su Yi didn’t take Zhangsun Hong at all seriously!

“Hah! You people really don’t know when to give in. Very well. Today, at the Autumn Waters Assembly, I’ll let you taste true despair!”

Beneath the distant dome of heaven, Zhangsun Hong laughed coldly, then drifted back onto the plateau.

The Yue clansmen’s expressions were all a bit unsightly.

All of them could tell that the Red Lotus Cult had come prepared, and furthermore, that they were domineering to the extreme!

“Let’s go.” Yue Bailing took a deep breath, then led the group toward the peak.

The plateau atop the steep mountain was fully a thousand feet across, and it was already supplied with chairs.

The Red Lotus Cult had sent...
